description.en: This scroll gives a random bonus to your weapon or shield. If the item already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.ar: This scroll gives a random bonus to your weapon or shield. If the item already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.br: Este pergaminho dá um bônus aleatório à sua arma ou escudo. Se o item já tiver um bônus, ele será substituído.
description.cns: 这个卷轴会让你的武器或盾牌随机获取一个增益效果。如果该物品已经有了增益效果，它将被覆盖。
description.de: Diese Schriftrolle gibt deiner Waffe oder deinem Schild einen zufälligen Bonus. Wenn der Gegenstand bereits einen Bonus hat, wird dieser überschrieben.
description.fi: This scroll gives a random bonus to your weapon or shield. If the item already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.fil: This scroll gives a random bonus to your weapon or shield. If the item already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.fr: Ce parchemin donne un bonus aléatoire sur votre arme ou votre bouclier. Si l'objet a déjà un bonus, il sera remplacé.
description.id: Scroll ini memberikan bonus acak untuk senjata atau perisai Anda. Jika barang sudah memiliki bonus maka akan ditimpa.
description.it: This scroll gives a random bonus to your weapon or shield. If the item already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.jp: この巻物は武器や盾にランダムでボーナスステータスを付与します。既にボーナスが付いている場合は上書きされます。
description.kr: 이 두루마리는 무기 또는 방패에 랜덤 보너스를 제공합니다. 아이템에 이미 보너스가 있는 경우 새로운 보너스를 적용시킵니다.
description.nl: This scroll gives a random bonus to your weapon or shield. If the item already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.pl: This scroll gives a random bonus to your weapon or shield. If the item already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.ru: This scroll gives a random bonus to your weapon or shield. If the item already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.sp: Este pergamino otorga un bonus aleatorio a tu arma o escudo. Si el objeto ya tiene un bonus se sobreescribirá.
description.sw: This scroll gives a random bonus to your weapon or shield. If the item already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.th: สุ่มโบนัสให้กับอาวุธหรือโล่ของคุณ หากไอเทมมีโบนัสอยู่แล้ว จะถูกทับ
description.tw: 可使用在武器或盾牌上獲得額外的能力增幅，若你的物品已獲得加成的話，將會覆蓋掉
description.vi: Cuộn này mang lại một phần thưởng ngẫu nhiên cho vũ khí hoặc lá chắn của bạn. Nếu mục đã có tiền thưởng, nó sẽ bị ghi đè.
